MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the EH4 postcode area of Edinburgh. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 9:08pm. Our engineers have arrived at the local substation and will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12:15AM. We will update this message if this information changes.  We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9.47PM on Sunday, 22 November 2020
